name: Blind Sound
description:
Blind Sound is a first person psychological horror game, featuring a Terrifying Environment and a Rich Story.

STORYLINE
What would you do if you Stuck in a Facility with a lot of Creepy Creatures? Play as a Victim, and Try to Escape from this hell! You Shouldn't be here but now it's too late to leave, Make your Decisions. Maybe you can still escape and no matter what never trust them?

Characters
Every character in Blind Sound has a story that blends seamlessly into the main narrative. Watch every step you make and be careful not to attract any unwanted attention. You won’t be alone here.

Gameplay
Use your FlashLight to Escape, Find the weakness of the Creatures and Try to Survive in this Facility.
